column5: I got some nice minnows at Jacobs bait on hiway 11 just south of Orillia today.  Just a heads up for anyone needing minnows.
Yes!  I thought I saw him open the last time I went up and meant to post it...niiiiiice     do you know if he is still doing the 24 hour service?
Don't know the name... but the one North of Orillia, before Washago exit, was closed when I went by there Monday am.
That is Pete's Sports.  It is open and they have minnows too.  The people at Epps have been nice to deal with also.
